name: MessyFriends
description:
MessyFriends by CrimaginumTeam

Play the 20 seconds of this cute(and messy) Couch-coop action/adventure game, we start playing as Cassie(Dog) and Tom(Cat), two animal agents that are on a mission to save their other friends from the hands of a very sinister man.

Gameplay:

The game doesn't have a very defined gameplay style, it's supposed to be a adventure game with a mashup of different genres and mechanics.

It is a game to be played with 2 Players(Using Keyboard and Mouse)

Game Jam Info: 

This game was developed for the 20 SECOND GAME JAM
We loved the idea of building a game that you can only play a little portion of, that give us the the challenge to make a very short captivating game that will make the players want to see more, that's what we've tried to make here, we don't think the game should really END within 20 second, while you can only play the first 20 seconds and "beat it", you will feel that this adventure continues further.

We are really open for feedback, so please, let us know what you think of the game on the commentary sections.
